   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Dec  4 11:58:09 2017.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

SOFTWARE
=========

The NBD cluster infrastructure is mainly dedicated to:

- Python Scripts (`All packages in  <https://anaconda.org/nostrumbiodiscovery/repo?type=conda&label=main>`_)

- GLIDE ( `Schrodinger Docs  <https://www.schrodinger.com/>`_ )

- CPPTRAJ (`CppTraj tutorials <http://ambermd.org/tutorials/analysis/>`_)


.. toctree::
   python/packages

.. toctree::
   glide/scripts


.. toctree::
   cpptraj/scripts
